title: NO INVITE PRIVILEGES
body:
In Oceania (don't know if other regions have this problem) no player is able to invite or join a friend. If you try to invite it will say that you will not have any invite privileges! And if you get invited you are not able to join. RIOT WHATS GOING ON MATES!
{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}

replies.body: What mode are you trying to invite to and are you the owner of the room?

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Kylar Alice,realm=OCE,application-id=mR0UmRrp,discussion-id=vPBHTE9P,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-02-13T11:05:21.351+0000)
>
> What mode are you trying to invite to and are you the owner of the room?

Dw its fixed now. (I am owner of the room but it still says i don't have invite privileges. I told my friend to try host but they had the same problem.)
